Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape
    Implementation of a basic circle object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
      double y,
      double radius)
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate of circle center
        y - Y-coordinate of circle center
        radius - Radius of circle, mus be greater than zero, otherwise will be set to default of 1.0. A circle with zero of negative radius just does not make sense.

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        Set the radius of the circle. New radius must be greater than zero, otherwise radius will remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        radius - New radius of cricle.

        Get the radius of the circle

        Output basic information about the circle.

        Returns:
